name: SKIPCHASER
description: SKIPCHASER is a story-driven sci-fi fantasy shooter with procedural missions, deep weapon customization and action/adventure elements.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7, Vista, or XP Service Pack 3 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 or higher (available in most modern Windows systems) Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 1.5 GHz processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 or higher (available in most modern Windows systems) Storage: 100 MB available space
